info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County through 330 PM MST... At 259 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jerome, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarkdale, Cottonwood, Jerome, Dead Horse Ranch State Park, Mingus Mountain Campground, Playground Group Campground, Potato Patch Campground and Tuzigoot National Monument. This includes State Route 89A between mile markers 334 and 353. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
